content: इष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [इष् इच्छायां कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Wished, desired, longed for, wished for; उपपन्नो गुणैरिष्टैः <ls>Nala. 1. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Beloved, agreeable, liked, favourite, dear; °आत्मजः <ls>Mu. 2. 8</ls> fond of sons. {@--3@} Worshipped, reverenced, {@--4@} Respected. {@--5@} Approved, regarded as good. {@--6@} Desirable; see इष्टापूर्त. {@--7@} Valid. {@--8@} Sacrificed, worshipped with sacrifices. {@--9@} Supposed (कल्पित); <ab>oft.</ab> used in <ls>Līlāvatī</ls>. --ष्टः {@--1@} A lover, husband, beloved person; इष्टप्रवासजनितानि <ls>Ś. 4. 2.</ls> {@--2@} A friend; <ls>Pt. 1. 57</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">2. 167.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (एरंड). {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--5@} A sacrifice. --ष्टा <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (शमी). --ष्टं {@--1@} Wish, desire. {@--2@} A holy ceremony or संस्कार. {@--3@} A sacrifice; see इष्टापूर्त. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} Voluntarily.
